Package semsim.fileaccessors

Class FileAccessorFactory

java.lang.Object
semsim.fileaccessors.FileAccessorFactory
public class FileAccessorFactory
extends java.lang.Object
Class for creating ModelAccessor instances from model files
Author:
mneal
